features: Vanicream is the #1 Dermatologist recommended Brand for Sensitive Skin (Source: IQVIA ProVoice Survey, 12 months ending July 2023)

Mild shampoo: This fragrance-free shampoo is pH balanced for all hair types; sensitive formula effectively and gently cleans both hair and scalp, helps remove flaking and scaling, and controls oily scalp
Gentle scalp care: Formulated to avoid common chemical irritants and harsh cleansing agents; this hair shampoo is betaine-free, gluten-free, sulfate-free, silicone-free, and protein-free
Ingredients for sensitive skin: Our products are free of dyes, fragrance, masking fragrance, lanolin, parabens and formaldehyde releasers
Dermatologist tested: Vanicream Shampoo is formulated with ingredients dermatologists consider desirable and not irritating or sensitizing to the skin
body.description: A fragrance-free formula for sensitive skin and scalp. Helps remove flaking and scaling and helps control oily scalp. Helps remove build-up from conditioners, hair sprays and other hair care products. Leaves hair clean and manageable. For best results follow with Free & Clear Hair Conditioner. From the makers of Vanicream Skin Care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hair feels amazing
reviews.reviewText: Some of the best shampoo on the market. Your hair will feel more amazing than ever. Scent free so shouldn’t have any allergic reaction. Very good for dry/sensitive scalps when you want to lay off the heavy duty stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and Effective
reviews.reviewText: Vanicream Shampoo does a really good job of cleaning my scalp. It is gentle on my hair. But the best thing is that my scalp feels clean. It is mild enough that if I leave it on for several minutes while showering, my scalp still feels nice.Vanicream products are really nice and safe to use. I strongly recommend them especially if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has improved my scalp issues by at least 50%
reviews.reviewText: I have been having issues with a very itchy (but not dry or flaky) scalp, as well as breakouts on my scalp. Shampoos like T-sal and Nizoral did nothing. Before splurging on a very expensive shampoo at Sephora, I thought I'd give this a try.It immediately cut the itching in half, which was fantastic. I also seem to be breaking out less often.It's not a miracle cure by any means, so it helps to have realistic expectations. I definitely still need to see a dermatologist and might end up getting the fancy shampoo anyways. But it was a good first line of defense and is definitely helping.It does dry your hair out, so I recommend using a cowash afterward. Actual conditioner will just make matters worse.I use this: https://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/B00RYRJEL8?psc=1&ref=ppx_pop_mob_b_asin_titleThe smell is annoying but it works very well. My hair is soft and the acne hasn't gotten worse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Truly fragrance free!
reviews.reviewText: I have always been sensitive to fragrances. I used to be able to tolerate products with a light scent but not I’m getting to the point where any hint of fragrance makes my eyes swell and I get a terrible headache. I am now having to look for 100% fragrance free products which is how I discovered Vanicream. I had purchased their face cleanser which is awesome so I decided to try out the shampoo. The pros are, it is truly fragrance free. It provides a good lather and gets your hair clean. The con for me is that it doesn’t provide enough moisture. My scalp is oily so I do appreciate that this product helps to keep my scalp oil free but my hair is long, course and curly. That’s where I need the moisture. After using this shampoo, I had to use double the amount of conditioner to get my hair detangled. The extra conditioner I had to use, left my hair limp and it was difficult to style. I think this a really good product but not for my course, long, curly hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No itchy head!
reviews.reviewText: Suds not a big deal, fragrance is non invasive, squeaky clean shiny hair. No itching…absolutely first time in forever!! I’m a true believer after one week. Love this shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Did Nothing For My Hair
reviews.reviewText: I am a middle-aged woman who has always had thin, straight hair with extremely sensative skin. I bought this shampoo hoping for a miracle that my skin and scalp would not break out. It worked! However, it didn't clean my hair or scalp. I left the shower the few times I used it still feeling dirty and having build up on my scalp. I even washed my hair 2-3 times hoping it was just me not scrubbing it enough. The smell was light and clean but I can't use a shampoo that doesn't leave my hair and scalp clean. Disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally no more burning eyes from shampoo!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve typically been using lemon scented shampoo but noticed my eyes would burn for the next two days after using it. Knowing I’m sensitive to fragrances and chemicals I decided to look for a shampoo that was fragrance free and safe for sensitive skin/eyes. I found this and it’s PERFECT. No eye irritation or any irritations whatsoever. I also find it perfect for my hair; others complained it’s drying? But my hair is typically on the greasier side so this was perfect for me! If your sensitive to fragrances and have oilier hair this may be for you!

This shampoo is lovely for sensitive scalp. I have severe eczema, and this is the shampoo recommended by my dermatologist! It works well, and when used with the conditioner, it leaves the hair shiny, soft, and very healthy. My hairdresser is impressed with how well it suds, and how well my hair looks. I can’t use hairspray because of the eczema, but the shampoo gives my hair body, and looking good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For about the last 7 or 8 years now every winter I get blotchy red patches on my face. A friend suggested that I try a product containing Zinc Pyrithione. After a bit of research I found this one came highly recommended. It wasn't cheap but it sorted out my skin problem upon first use, so I'd say that it was money well spent.

I’ve been looking for Free and Clear for ages and trying to get it from abroad so grabbed it when it became available on Amazon India. If you have allergies or sensitivities - this is the best shampoo you can buy for yourself. Even if you don’t, it’s an excellent product minus the harsh additives. Leaves my hair feeling lush! Would highly recommend it.

I have oily scalp and thin dyed hair. It suits me very well. I also get dandruff very easily with harsh cleansers in shampoo. But this shampoo is so light and forgiving on skin, i am dandruff free now. I already ordered another bottle.

reviews.reviewTitle: A MI NO PERO A MI MARIDO SI
reviews.reviewText: He empezado a utilizar este producto al mismo tiempo que otro champú de biotina para cuero cabelludo sensible comprado en amazon.com. Para mí éste no es el champú, siento que el pelo me dura poco limpio, aunque la verdad es que es muy suave. Sin embargo a mi marido que también tiene problemas de cuero cabelludo le ha encantado. Tengo previsto comprar más productos de esta línea y darles una oportunidad porque me gustan mucho los ingredientes. Así que se lleva cinco estrellas aunque no sea para mí
